name: Super Orthopedic Flight Simulator
description:
Fly through the house as a toy plane, race against the timer and collect all 15 stars as fast as you can!  Challenge your friends in the comments, who will be the fastest? Will you win a gold medal? 

instructions:

W/S:  Accelerate & decelerate.

A/D: Steer left & right.

Up/Down: Ascend/descend (inverted).

Left/Right: tilt Plane.
